title: Authors and Citation
text: Taylor T (2023). NHSmod11: Validate NHS Numbers. R package version 0.1.1, https://github.com/TimTaylor/NHSmod11.
code: @Manual{,   title = {NHSmod11: Validate NHS Numbers},   author = {Tim Taylor},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.1},   url = {https://github.com/TimTaylor/NHSmod11}, }

title: Validate NHS Numbers
text: package yet code reviewed yet used production. Buyer beware Minimal efficient package validate given NHS number passes modulo 11 check (see https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/attributes/nhs_number.html details).

title: Validate NHS Numbers
text: development version, documentation refers , can installed GitHub via

title: Validate NHS Numbers
code: library(NHSmod11)  # all of these should be valid dat1 <- c("5390502108", "2788584652", "3510670485", "4001126419", "5309741852") is_nhs_number(dat1) #> [1] TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE  # these are numeric versions of above and should therefore also be valid dat2 <- c(5390502108, 2788584652, 3510670485, 4001126419, 5309741852) is_nhs_number(dat2) #> [1] TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE  # these should all be invalid unless we set the na_as_false argument as FALSE dat3 <- c("5390502107", "2788584651", "3510670484", "4001126418", NA_character_) is_nhs_number(dat3) #> [1] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE    NA is_nhs_number(dat3, na_as_false = FALSE) #> [1] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE    NA

title: Validate NHS Numbers
text: Bug reports feature requests posted GitHub using issue system.

title: Validate NHS Numbers
text: nhsnumber provides alternative implementation. comparison see https://github.com/TimTaylor/NHSmod11/issues/1.

title: Validate NHS number — is_nhs_number
text: `is_nhs_number()` generic testing whether input valid NHS number terms modulo 11 check. Methods provided character numeric input.

title: Validate NHS number — is_nhs_number
code: is_nhs_number(x, ...)  # S3 method for default is_nhs_number(x, ...)  # S3 method for numeric is_nhs_number(x, ...)  # S3 method for character is_nhs_number(x, ...)

title: Validate NHS number — is_nhs_number
text: Validity determined solely whether input passes modulo 11 check. number verified numbers issued additional checking first nine digits performed. Character input contain integer values (e.g. hyphens spaces).

title: Validate NHS number — is_nhs_number
code: dat <- c("5390502108", NA_character_, "2788584652", "3510670484") is_nhs_number(dat) #> [1]  TRUE    NA  TRUE FALSE  dat <- c(5390502108, NA_real_, 2788584652, 3510670484) is_nhs_number(dat) #> [1]  TRUE    NA  TRUE FALSE
